title: Petition to make pentakill yorick graves be doing the metal fist instead of hand!
body: as you all know when yorick Qs a minion or every 12 minion death, a grave is created that looks like a ghostly hand coming out of the ground. i think itd be REALLY cool if on the pentakill skin they did the rock/metal sign gesture instead of the open hand. thoughts?

replies.body: I dying to see it go ahead
hehe i see what you did there =P
I reckon Graves (champion) should have an interaction with Yorick. Just a nod to the fact that Yorick 'digs' Graves.
